member.name: M:MedicApi.Controllers.ReportsController.TestApi(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of articles from CDC website that fit into the criteria provided.
member.remarks:
API Usage Information:
API Returns list of articles with nested info in a JSON format.
This API will return data to be used by EPIWatch Frontend.
Only start time and end time is Mandatory.
All other fields for query is optional and determines what is returned.
member.param: Starting time of the period of interest. “yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss”
Ending time of the period of interest. “yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss”
The time zone associated with the given start and end dates. Example: “AEST”
The name of a location. Example: “Sydney”
Max number of reports to search. (default: 25, maximum: 50)
The number of the first report returned. (default: 0)

member.name: M:MedicApi.Services.ReportFinder.ParseRawInput(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime@,System.DateTime@,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@,System.String@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Converts the raw parameters into their proper types. Handles default values and reduces parameters to their maximum allowed values.

member.name: M:MedicApi.Services.ReportFinder.CheckRawInput(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks the raw parameters passed to the API. Arguments can be null, indicating that no value was specified for the parameter.
